original_text:
“As surely as God lives, who has denied me justice,
    the Almighty, who has made my life bitter,
korean_text: 나의 정당함을 물리치신 하나님, 나의 영혼을 괴롭게 하신 전능자의 사심을 두고 맹세하노니

sentences.original_text: the Almighty, who has made my life bitter,"
sentences.korean_translation: 전능하신 이는 내 생애를 씁쓸하게 하셨느니라."
